info.author: @steepshot
info.description:
## SteepData
This is fork of the SteemData project.
The goal of the SteepData project is to make data from the
STEEM blockchain more accessible to developers, researchers and 3rd party services.

This repo contains utilities for parsing STEEM blockchain, retrieving price feeds and some extra helpers.

### Contribute
Needless to say, PR's are welcome :)

### License
This project is [MIT](https://github.com/Chainers/steepdata) Licensed.

info.summary: Python Utilities for parsing STEEM blockchain
info.html_description:
## SteepData This is fork of the SteemData project. The goal of the SteepData project is to make data from the STEEM blockchain more accessible to developers, researchers and 3rd party services.

This repo contains utilities for parsing STEEM blockchain, retrieving price feeds and some extra helpers.

### Contribute Needless to say, PR’s are welcome :)

### License This project is [MIT](https://github.com/Chainers/steepdata) Licensed.
